channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Merz Challenges Germans to Make a Bold Strategic Shift. Will They Do It?
item.description: The likely next chancellor has staked his government on a move to increase military spending. But the window for change is closing fast.

item.title: The next C-suite pivot is from a DEI to a DOGE mindset—and leadership roles are in for a shakeup
item.description: Most current executives grew up in an economy sheltered from the most destructive forms of competition. It’s time to refocus.

item.title: AI models take on EQ, the Iowa Writers’ Workshop, and mountain climbing
item.description: AI companies are increasingly encroaching on domains that go to the core of our sense of ourselves as a species.
